title: Plot Methods — plot
text: Visualize performance spectrum.

code: # S3 method for ps_aggregated plot(x, ...)  # S3 method for ps_detailed plot(x, ...)

title: Plot Methods — plot
text: x Object class ps_aggregated() ps_detailed(). ... Additional variables pass .

title: Plot Methods — plot
text: ggplot2 object, can customised .

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
text: Plots aggregated performance spectrum. performance spectrum describes event data terms segments, .e., pairs related process steps. performance segment measured plotted occurrences segment time can classified, e.g., regarding overall population. aggregated performance spectrum visualises amount cases particular performance time (Denisov et al., 2018). See References details.

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
code: ps_aggregated(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   grouping = c("start", "complete"),   scale = NULL,   bins = 30 )  # S3 method for log ps_aggregated(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   grouping = c("start", "complete"),   scale = NULL,   bins = 30 )  # S3 method for grouped_log ps_aggregated(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   grouping = c("start", "complete"),   scale = NULL,   bins = NULL )

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (grouped_log, eventlog, activitylog, etc.). segment_coverage, n_segments numeric: Provide either segment_coverage n_segments. neither provided, segment_coverage = 0.2 used.segment_coverage: percentage cases (default 0.2) segment must present visualised spectrum. Ignored n_segments specified.n_segments: Visualise top n segments based frequency. classification character (default NULL): variable defining colour legend. variable present log. NULL (default) log grouped_log, first grouping variable used classification. NULL (default) "quartile" log eventlog activitylog, quartile variable dividing durations segments quartiles calculated. grouping character (default "start"): timestamps, "start" "complete", binned histogram. scale ggplot2 scale function (default scale_fill_discrete_bupaR): Set color scale. Defaults scale_fill_discrete_bupaR. bins numeric (default 30): number bins aggregated performance spectrum.

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
text: ggplot2 object describing aggregated performance spectrum.

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
text: ps_aggregated(log): Plot aggregated performance spectrum log. ps_aggregated(grouped_log): Plot aggregated performance spectrum grouped_log.

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
text: Denisov, V., Fahland, D., & van der Aalst, W. M. P. (2018). Unbiased, Fine-Grained Description Processes Performance Event Data. M. Weske, M. Montali, . Weber, & J. vom Brocke (Eds.), Proceedings 16th International Conference Business Process Management (Vol. 11080, pp. 139–157). Springer International Publishing. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-98648-7_9

title: Aggregated Performance Spectrum — ps_aggregated
code: library(psmineR) library(eventdataR)  sepsis %>%  ps_aggregated(segment_coverage = 0.2,                classification = "quartile",                grouping = "start",                bins = 15)

title: Detailed Performance Spectrum — ps_detailed
text: Plots detailed performance spectrum. performance spectrum describes event data terms segments, .e., pairs related process steps. performance segment measured plotted occurrences segment time can classified, e.g., regarding overall population. detailed performance spectrum visualises variability durations segment across cases time (Denisov et al., 2018). See References details.

title: Detailed Performance Spectrum — ps_detailed
code: ps_detailed(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   scale = NULL )  # S3 method for log ps_detailed(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   scale = NULL )  # S3 method for grouped_log ps_detailed(   log,   segment_coverage,   n_segments,   classification = NULL,   scale = NULL )

title: Detailed Performance Spectrum — ps_detailed
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (grouped_log, eventlog, activitylog, etc.). segment_coverage, n_segments numeric: Provide either segment_coverage n_segments. neither provided, segment_coverage = 0.2 used.segment_coverage: percentage cases (default 0.2) segment must present visualised spectrum. Ignored n_segments specified.n_segments: Visualise top n segments based frequency. classification character (default NULL): variable defining colour legend. variable present log. NULL (default) log grouped_log, first grouping variable used classification. NULL (default) "quartile" log eventlog activitylog, quartile variable dividing durations segments quartiles calculated. scale ggplot2 scale function (default scale_color_discrete_bupaR): Set color scale. Defaults scale_color_discrete_bupaR.

title: Detailed Performance Spectrum — ps_detailed
text: ggplot2 object describing detailed performance spectrum.

title: Detailed Performance Spectrum — ps_detailed
text: ps_detailed(log): Plot detailed performance spectrum log. ps_detailed(grouped_log): Plot detailed performance spectrum grouped_log.
